main.title: Self-expression and Beauty
main.subTitle: Piercing artist
main.text: Explore new facets of your style with Darya

about.text: My name is Dasha, and I'm excited to welcome you to my world of piercing and self-expression. With a passion for art and years of experience in the beauty industry, I craft unique and stylish piercings that help my clients discover new aspects of their style. My mission is not just to decorate, but to help people express their individuality through creative and stunning piercings. With a focus on detail and safety, each piercing is made with love and care, so you can feel confident and stylish. Let me help you explore new ways to express yourself and give your look a distinctive character. Let's create something amazing together!
